script:
FADE IN:

A quiet city street at sunrise.
Soft ambient music plays as people begin their day.

A young filmmaker sits alone in a cafÃ©, staring at their laptop.
They hesitate, then start typing.

MONTAGE:
Quick shots of writing, deleting, pacing, thinking.

The music slowly builds.

Suddenly, the laptop crashes.
The screen goes black.
The music stops.

Silence.

The filmmaker panics, trying to recover the work.
Heartbeats grow louder.

CUT TO:

The laptop reboots.
The script reappears.
Relief floods their face.

Music swells into a powerful climax.

They smile.
The story is ready.

FADE OUT.
